fields.label: Logo
fields.name: logo
fields.description:
For now we use material icon theme, so please pick from this list:
                https://github.com/PKief/vscode-material-icon-theme/tree/main/icons. Make sure to omit ".svg" extension. So if you want Javascript, the right value
                is "javascript"

fields.label: Logo upload
fields.name: logo_upload
fields.description:
If logo does not already exist in the repository, upload your own.
                Make sure background is transparent (e.g. .png or .svg file)
